trans-unit.source: Start Workflow Accelerator

seg-source.mrk: Start Workflow Accelerator

target.mrk: Workflow Accelerator starten

trans-unit.source: After completing the installation as described above, both the MongoDB database and the Tomcat application server must be started for Workflow Accelerator to run properly. This section will give you more details on how to start them.

seg-source.mrk: After completing the installation as described above, both the MongoDB database and the Tomcat application server must be started for Workflow Accelerator to run properly.
This section will give you more details on how to start them.

target.mrk: Nachdem die Installation wie oben beschrieben abgeschlossen ist, ist es notwendig MongoDB und Tomcat zu starten, um Workflow Accelerator erfolgreich auszuführen.
Im darauffolgenden Abschnitt findet sich eine Startanleitung.

trans-unit.source: Windows

seg-source.mrk: Windows

target.mrk: Windows

trans-unit.source: MongoDB

seg-source.mrk: MongoDB

target.mrk: MongoDB

trans-unit.source: If you followed the instructions in this guide and registered a service for MongoDB, you can simply start the MongoDB server by opening a command line with administrator privileges and execute the following command:

seg-source.mrk: If you followed the instructions in this guide and registered a service for MongoDB, you can simply start the MongoDB server by opening a command line with administrator privileges and execute the following command:

target.mrk: Falls Sie den Anweisungen in diesem Handbuch gefolgt sind und MongoDB als Windows Service registriert haben, können Sie den MongoDB Server einfach über die Kommandozeile mit dem folgenden Befehl ausführen:

trans-unit.source: The registration also defined the startup type of the MongoDB service as “Automatic” which means it will start automatically if you restart the Windows system. Alternatively, you can manage the MongoDB service by opening the <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">services.msc</kbd>. There, MongoDB will be listed among the other services and can be started and stopped.

seg-source.mrk: The registration also defined the startup type of the MongoDB service as “Automatic” which means it will start automatically if you restart the Windows system.
Alternatively, you can manage the MongoDB service by opening the <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">services.msc</kbd>.
There, MongoDB will be listed among the other services and can be started and stopped.

target.mrk: Im Zuge der Serviceregistrierung wurde zudem der Startup-Typ als “automatisch” festgelegt, sodas MongoDB nach jedem Windows-Start automatisch ausgeführt wird.

alt-trans.seg-source: Alternatively, you can manage the MongoDB service by opening the <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">services.msc</kbd>. There, MongoDB will be listed among the other services and can be started and stopped.
alt-trans.target: MongoDB kann zudem über Windows “Dienste”-Benutzeroberfläche (<kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">services.msc</kbd>) gestartet, gestoppt und konfiguriert werden.

trans-unit.source: Tomcat

seg-source.mrk: Tomcat

target.mrk: Tomcat

trans-unit.source: Assuming you installed Tomcat using the Windows service installer, you can open the Tomcat configuration dialog again by opening the Windows start menu and selecting <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">Program Files\Apache Tomcat\Configure Tomcat</kbd>. The tab General contains respective buttons to start and stop the Tomcat service.

seg-source.mrk: Assuming you installed Tomcat using the Windows service installer, you can open the Tomcat configuration dialog again by opening the Windows start menu and selecting <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">Program Files\Apache Tomcat\Configure Tomcat</kbd>.
The tab General contains respective buttons to start and stop the Tomcat service.

target.mrk: Falls Sie Tomcat mit Hilfe des Windows Service Installers installiert haben, können Sie den Tomcat Konfigurationsdialog öffnen indem Sie das Windows Startmenü öffnen und unter <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">Programme\\Apache Tomcat\\ Configure Tomcat</kbd> auswählen.
Im Tab “General” befinden sich die Schaltflächen zum Starten und Stoppen des Tomcats.

trans-unit.source: Furthermore, you have the option to define the startup type of the service. By default, this should be “Manual” which means you have to start the Tomcat server manually each time the server restarts. You can change the type to “Automatic”. Then the Tomcat server will start automatically each time you restart your Windows server.

seg-source.mrk: Furthermore, you have the option to define the startup type of the service.
By default, this should be “Manual” which means you have to start the Tomcat server manually each time the server restarts.
You can change the type to “Automatic”.
Then the Tomcat server will start automatically each time you restart your Windows server.

target.mrk: Zudem können Sie den Startup-Typ des Services festlegen.
Standardmäßig ist dies “Manuell”, Sie müssen den Service nach jedem Systemstart manuell starten.

alt-trans.seg-source: You can change the type to “Automatic”. Then the Tomcat server will start automatically each time you restart your Windows server.
alt-trans.target: Es ist empfehlenswert, diese Einstellung auf „Automatisch“ zu ändern, damit der Tomcat-Server nach einem Reboot des Betriebssystems automatisch wieder läuft.

trans-unit.source: Script Engine

seg-source.mrk: Script Engine

target.mrk: Script Engine

trans-unit.source: If you installed the script engine and wrapped it into a service, you can open the <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">services.msc</kbd>, locate the Signavio Script Engine service and start it there. Otherwise open a command line, navigate to the <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$SCRIPT_ENGINE_HOME</kbd> directory and execute:

seg-source.mrk: If you installed the script engine and wrapped it into a service, you can open the <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">services.msc</kbd>, locate the Signavio Script Engine service and start it there.
Otherwise open a command line, navigate to the <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$SCRIPT_ENGINE_HOME</kbd> directory and execute:

target.mrk: Wenn Sie die Script Engine installiert und als Service registriert haben, können Sie <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">services.msc</kbd> öffnen und den Script Engine Service von dort starten.
Andernfalls öffnen Sie die Kommandozeile, navigieren Sie zum Verzeichnis <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">$SCRIPT_ENGINE_HOME</kbd> und führen Sie folgenden Befehl aus:

trans-unit.source: Note, you cannot close the command line as long as the script engine is running.

seg-source.mrk: Note, you cannot close the command line as long as the script engine is running.

target.mrk: Beachten Sie, dass Sie die Kommandozeile nicht beenden können, solange die Script Engine ausgeführt wird.

trans-unit.source: If you installed the mail relay and wrapped it into a service, you can open the <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">services.msc</kbd>, locate the Signavio Mail Relay service and start it there. Otherwise open a command line and execute (replace the placeholder with the absolute path):

seg-source.mrk: If you installed the mail relay and wrapped it into a service, you can open the <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">services.msc</kbd>, locate the Signavio Mail Relay service and start it there.
Otherwise open a command line and execute (replace the placeholder with the absolute path):

target.mrk: Wenn Sie das Mail Relay installiert und als Service registriert haben, können Sie <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">services.msc</kbd> öffnen und den Mail Relay-Service von dort starten.
Ansonsten öffnen Sie die Kommandozeile und führen Sie folgendes Kommando aus (ersetzen Sie bitte den Platzhalter mit dem absoluten Dateipfad):

trans-unit.source: Note, you cannot close the command line as long as the mail relay is running.

seg-source.mrk: Note, you cannot close the command line as long as the mail relay is running.

target.mrk: Beachten Sie, dass Sie die Kommandozeile nicht beenden können, solange das Mail Relay ausgeführt wird.

trans-unit.source: MongoDB

seg-source.mrk: MongoDB

target.mrk: MongoDB

trans-unit.source: If you followed the instructions in this guide to setup MongoDB using a packet manager, some additional scripts have been installed that allow you to start, stop and restart the database very easily. Be aware, the execution of those scripts require root privileges. :

seg-source.mrk: If you followed the instructions in this guide to setup MongoDB using a packet manager, some additional scripts have been installed that allow you to start, stop and restart the database very easily.
Be aware, the execution of those scripts require root privileges.

target.mrk: Falls Sie MongoDB wie in diesem Handbuch beschrieben über einen Paketmanager installiert haben, können Sie MongoDB nun wie Tomcat mit einem Befehl auf der Kommandozeile starten.
Für die Ausführung benötigen Sie Root-Rechte.

trans-unit.source: If MongoDB is already running, you can restart the database by executing:

seg-source.mrk: If MongoDB is already running, you can restart the database by executing:

target.mrk: Falls MongoDB bereits läuft, können Sie den Service mit folgendem Befehl neustarten:

trans-unit.source: In order to determine whether MongoDB is running or not, you can check upon the status with the following command:

seg-source.mrk: In order to determine whether MongoDB is running or not, you can check upon the status with the following command:

target.mrk: Um den Status von MongoDB herauszufinden und zu prüfen ob der Service läuft oder nicht, führen Sie folgenden Befehl aus:

trans-unit.source: Be aware, in earlier versions of MongoDB, e.g. 2.4.x, the scripts had a different name <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">/etc/init.d/mongodb</kbd>

seg-source.mrk: Be aware, in earlier versions of MongoDB, e.g. 2.4.x, the scripts had a different name <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">/etc/init.d/mongodb</kbd>

target.mrk: Beachten Sie, in früheren Versionen von MongoDB, z.B. 2.4.x, hatten die Skripte einen anderen Namen <kbd xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">/etc/init.d/mongodb</kbd>.

trans-unit.source: Tomcat

seg-source.mrk: Tomcat

target.mrk: Tomcat

trans-unit.source: The recommended way to install Tomcat is to use a packet manager. Installing Tomcat under Debian with APT will install additional scripts to start, stop and restart the server. Be aware, the execution of those scripts might require root privileges:

seg-source.mrk: The recommended way to install Tomcat is to use a packet manager.
Installing Tomcat under Debian with APT will install additional scripts to start, stop and restart the server.
Be aware, the execution of those scripts might require root privileges:

target.mrk: Zum Ausführen der Skripte sind eventuell Root-Rechte erforderlich:

alt-trans.seg-source: The recommended way to install Tomcat is to use a packet manager. Installing Tomcat under Debian with APT will install additional scripts to start, stop and restart the server.
alt-trans.target: Auch Tomcat sollte über einen Paketmanager wie APT installiert worden sein, der automatisch die Skripte zum Starten, Stoppen und Restarten von Tomcat hinterlegt.

target.mrk: Außerdem können Sie den aktuellen Status von Tomcat mit folgenden Befehl überprüfen und so herausfinden, ob der Server läuft:
